verses.verse: Awake,<WH5782> awake,<WH5782> put on<WH3847> your strength,<WH5797> Zion;<WH6726> put on<WH3847> your beautiful<WH8597> garments,<WH899> Jerusalem,<WH3389> the holy<WH6944> city:<WH5892> for henceforth there shall no more<WH3254> come<WH935> into you the uncircumcised<WH6189> and the unclean.<WH2931>

Shake<WH5287> yourself from the dust!<WH6083> Arise,<WH6965> sit<WH3427> up,<WH3389> Jerusalem! Release<WH6605> yourself from the bonds<WH4147> of your neck,<WH6677> captive<WH7628> daughter<WH1323> of Zion!<WH6726>
For thus says<WH559> Yahweh,<WH3068> "You were sold<WH4376> for nothing;<WH2600> and you shall be redeemed<WH1350> without money.<WH3701>"

For thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Yahweh,<WH136> "My people<WH5971> went down<WH3381> at the first<WH7223> into Egypt<WH4714> to live<WH1481> there:<WH804> and the Assyrian has oppressed<WH6231> them without cause.<WH657>

"Now therefore,<WH5002> what do I do here," says Yahweh,<WH3068> "seeing that my people<WH5971> are taken away<WH3947> for nothing?<WH2600> Those who rule<WH4910> over them mock,<WH3213>" says<WH5002> Yahweh,<WH3068> "and my name<WH8034> continually<WH8548> all the day<WH3117> is blasphemed.<WH5006>
Therefore my people<WH5971> shall know<WH3045> my name.<WH8034> Therefore they shall know in that day<WH3117> that I am he who speaks;<WH1696> behold, it is I."

How beautiful<WH4998> on the mountains<WH2022> are the feet<WH7272> of him who brings good news,<WH1319> who publishes<WH8085> peace,<WH7965> who brings good news<WH1319> of good,<WH2896> who publishes<WH8085> salvation,<WH3444> who says<WH559> to Zion,<WH6726> "Your God<WH430> reigns!<WH4427>"

The voice<WH6963> of your watchmen!<WH6822> they lift up<WH5375> the voice,<WH6963> together<WH3162> do they sing;<WH7442> for they shall see<WH7200> eye<WH5869> to eye,<WH5869> when Yahweh<WH3068> returns<WH7725> to Zion.<WH6726>

Break forth into joy,<WH6476> sing<WH7442> together,<WH3162> you waste places<WH2723> of Jerusalem;<WH3389> for Yahweh<WH3068> has comforted<WH5162> his people,<WH5971> he has redeemed<WH1350> Jerusalem.<WH3389>

Yahweh<WH3068> has made bare<WH2834> his holy<WH6944> arm<WH2220> in the eyes<WH5869> of all the nations;<WH1471> and all the ends<WH657> of the earth<WH776> have seen<WH7200> the salvation<WH3444> of our God.<WH430>

Depart,<WH5493> depart,<WH5493> go out<WH3318> from there,<WH5060> touch no unclean<WH2931> thing!<WH3318> Go out of the midst<WH8432> of her!<WH1305> Cleanse yourselves,<WH5375> you who bear the vessels<WH3627> of Yahweh.<WH3068>

For you shall not go out<WH3318> in haste,<WH2649> neither shall you go<WH1980> by flight:<WH4499> for Yahweh<WH3068> will go<WH1980> before<WH6440> you;<WH430> and the God of Israel<WH3478> will be your rear guard.<WH622>
Behold,<WH5650> my servant shall deal wisely,<WH7919> he shall be exalted<WH7311> and lifted<WH5375> up,<WH3966> and shall be very high.<WH1361>
Like as many<WH7227> were astonished<WH8074> at you<WH4758> (his appearance was marred<WH4893> more than any man,<WH376> and his form<WH8389> more than the sons<WH1121> of men<WH120>),

so shall he sprinkle<WH5137> many<WH7227> nations;<WH1471> kings<WH4428> shall shut<WH7092> their mouths<WH6310> at him:<WH5608> for that which had not been told them shall they see;<WH7200> and that which they had not heard<WH8085> shall they understand.<WH995>
